integration_patterns: Real-time Data Streaming with AWS Kinesis

evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS for its cloud services including Lambda and S3.
Mobile Anesthesiologists indicates compliance with HIPAA for patient data handling.
Integration patterns related to EHR systems are discussed in the developer section.
They utilize HL7 and X12 standards for healthcare transactions.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses X12 transactions for healthcare, indicating strong API automation needs.
